name: Azirel
description:
Azirel - OST game jam 2020

NOTICE:the web version of the game is broken, you cannot use the text input field in the last room, which makes it impossible to finish the game.
You are a little robot in some kind of abandonned spaceship and you try to get out. Controls are pretty straightforward and you can click on stuff. The thing on the right is your inventory. I haven't had the time to do all the animations and the game is pretty empty. 

To close the windows application you must alt+f4

Credits:

3d Models:
Fire extinguisher - Loïc
Chemistry Lab  - martina.fabricci
Lab things - Renafox

Music:
Croix Baker - Continuation
Shivervein - Ceramic Burn
Draelent - Technology Takes Over The World
Track - Digital Forest
Peter Chang - Xenon

Hints (spoilers ahead) :
  1. Try clicking randomly on stuff, once you find a door, go through it and come back later. 
  2. You can click through your inventory (if your screen is too small) 
  3. If you don't find the solution there idk what to tell you
  4. If the button doesn't work it's because the password is wrong. Look in the lab (room 2).
